channel.title: Abouts on SCOPED
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on SCOPED

item.title: SCOPED
item.description: SCOPED is an NSF-funded project and part of the NSF CSSI program. The SCOPED project goal is to establish a novel hybrid cloud+HPC computational platform for use by the broader scientific community that combines large-scale processing and modeling of seismic data with a suite of open-source seismic codes. Continue reading to get the list of supported software.
Watch our Open Science Lecture (Marine Denolle and Alice Gabriel)
